comment: Jeremy Corbyn being called a good guy? That's like calling mussolini or Stalin good guys. Being convinced your ideology is right does not automatically make you good. And if history has proved, beyond doubt, that your ideology is flawed & in fact dangerous, doubling down on Marxism makes you stupid or evil. Or both
amr:
# ::snt Jeremy Corbyn being called a good guy? That's like calling mussolini or Stalin good guys. Being convinced your ideology is right does not automatically make you good. And if history has proved, beyond doubt, that your ideology is flawed & in fact dangerous, doubling down on Marxism makes you stupid or evil. Or both
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG1 (c / call-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jeremy"
                              :op2 "Corbyn"))
                  :ARG2 (g / guy
                        :ARG1-of (g2 / good-02)))
            :ARG2 (c2 / call-01
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Mussolini"))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Stalin")))
                  :ARG2 g)
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op2 (m2 / make-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (c3 / convince-01
                        :ARG1 (y / you)
                        :ARG2 (r2 / right-02
                              :ARG1 (ii / ideology
                                    :poss y)))
                  :ARG1 (g3 / good-02
                        :ARG1 y)
                  :manner (a3 / automatic)))
      :snt3 (a4 / and
            :op2 (m3 / make-02
                  :ARG0 (d / double-down-00
                        :ARG0 (h / history)
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / ideology
                              :poss y))
                  :ARG1 (o2 / or
                        :op1 (s / stupid
                              :domain y)
                        :op2 (e / evil
                              :domain y))
                  :condition (p4 / prove-01
                        :ARG0 h
                        :ARG1 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (f / flaw-01
                                    :ARG1 (ii3 / ideology
                                          :poss y))
                              :op2 (e2 / endanger-01
                                    :ARG0 ii3)
                              :mod (ii4 / in-fact)))))
      :snt4 (o3 / or
            :op2 (b / both)))

comment: It seems you are a collectivist. That ideology 'Collectivism, has led to the death of millions, you've been manipulated and duped by a flawed theory.
